body:
My Minecraft account won't work for some reason. I tried everything. It doesn't recognize my username or password.

-Deleting .minecraft and launcher.

-changing password and email.

-restarting pc and internet.

-receiving a hug (=c)

Please help, like dafuq ;-;

EDIT: IS WORKING NOW, CAN LOCK.
body_tagged:
My Minecraft account won't work for some reason. I tried everything. It doesn't recognize my username or password.

-Deleting .minecraft and launcher.

-changing password and email.

-restarting pc and internet.

-receiving a hug (=c)

Please help, like dafuq ;-;

title: Minecraft account login won't work. HALP

replies.body: Nope. Not even to Minecraft.com and Magic Launcher.
replies.body_tagged: Nope. Not even to Minecraft.com and Magic Launcher.

replies.body: Try it on an other PC
replies.body_tagged: Try it on an other PC

replies.body: Are you using your username to sign in? If so, use the email you used to create the account. If it's the other way around, then vice versa.
replies.body_tagged: Are you using your username to sign in? If so, use the email you used to create the account. If it's the other way around, then vice versa.

replies.body: I know how to fix it! Sometimes it just gets bugged. Same thing happened to me, too. Just try to log in tomorrow. Make sure that it will be fixed.
replies.body_tagged: I know how to fix it! Sometimes it just gets bugged. Same thing happened to me, too. Just try to log in tomorrow. Make sure that it will be fixed.

Hello, I just read this and I understand what the problem is. I tried to use an Account Generator just to see if it worked and it didn't. I tried several times and well... Read this and you'll know

https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/781529
